ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can t increase your skills with 2-handed weapons, so stick to practicing 1-h blunt, 1-h slash & pierce. Your using a long sword at level 7?  You re
ygData.messageBody:
> Ok, for those who missed the last post, I am a level 7, almost 8 bard.
> Right now I am using a regular Long Sword. Not too dramatic..:)
>
> I know I get dual wield at 17, and that sounds nice but I was
> wondering
> what it maxes out at and if its better to get dual wield for
> 2 1h slashers
> or to invest in a 2h slasher like a bibs?

You can't increase your skills with 2-handed weapons, so stick to practicing
1-h blunt, 1-h slash & pierce.

Your using a long sword at level 7? You're doing better in life than I was
at your age. I'm using a bronze mace right now until my 1h blunt gets
maxed. Then I'll break out a short sword. I've already maxed piercing for
my level with a FS rapier someone was kind enough to include in a trade for
a HQ bear skin I'd looted. Look to get a combine weapon as soon as you can.
No idea how much they cost as I can never find a vendor selling one. (grrr)

happy hunting
Evulia
